Discussions.Discussion_Name: Link for zoom session on Monday, 16:15

Messages.Author: Peter Bank
Messages.Content: Dear all, as announced in class, the lecture next Monday, 16:15, will have to be online via Zoom. Please connect to https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/67165342867?pwd=SjJaZWljVFVTcFJxbmU0R20xMmJDUT09 See you there and then, Peter Bank

Messages.Author: Peter Bank
Messages.Content: Dear all, today's exercise classes have to be merged into one at 2:15pm in MA550 and will be done me. See you there, Peter Bank

Messages.Author: Heather Franziska Bielert
Messages.Content: Dear students, my office hours on Thursday 20.6. are cancelled. Greets, Franziska

Messages.Author: Heather Franziska Bielert
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  tomorrow I will bring a projector, so we can discuss the programming exercises in presence.  Greets, Franziska

Messages.Author: Heather Franziska Bielert
Messages.Content: Dear students, my office hours on Thursday 6.4. are cancelled. Greets, Franziska

Messages.Author: Heather Franziska Bielert
Messages.Content: Dear students, the first exercise sheet for the classes next tuesday 22.4. are online.  As always it is best for you to work on them before the class! You may submit written solutions to me, I will collect them on Mondays before the lecture. For the rest of the term the homework will be uploaded on Tuesdays (Wednesday at the latest) and discussed in the tutorial on the following Tuesday. Looking forward to see you in class, Franziska

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Next lecture, Tuesday, starts a little later

Messages.Author: Peter Bank
Messages.Content: Dear all, as explained in class today, the lecture on Tuesday, April 16, will start only at 16:30h or even later, depending on how long the deliberations on a PhD defense, that I have to chair, will last. Thanks for your understanding, Peter Bank

Discussions.Discussion_Name: New lecture hall; new time on Tuesday

Messages.Author: Peter Bank
Messages.Content: Dear all, the lecture halls that were assigned for our course originally have turned out to be utterly inappropriate (e.g. no black board despite my explicit request). So we had to got on the hunt for lecture halls ourselves and fortunately were successful, albeit with the necessity to accept a new time slot on Tuesday. So, our current lecture times are Mondays, 10:15-10:45 Tuesdays, 16:15-18:45 and the lecture hall is in BH-N 243. This is the "Bergbau und Hüttenwesen"-building right new to the U-Bahn exit Ernst-Reuter-Platz; see https://www.tu.berlin/studieren/uni-leben/campusplan . Looking forward to seeing you there next week, Peter Bank PS Contrary to what the red marker may suggest, the entrance to the building is actually in the lower right (aka South East) corner of the attached map.

Messages.Author: Yannick Lukas Weimer
Messages.Content: Hello, Since I was sick I couldn't attend the lecture on Monday, if someone could send me their notes that would be really helpful! :) My E-Mail is yannick_lukas@tu-berlin.de Thank you very much for your help! Yannick.
